scripts.start: concurrently "npm run serve --prefix front-end" "npm run start --prefix back-end"
scripts.atualizar: npm install && (cd front-end && npm install) && (cd back-end && npm install)
scripts.build: (cd front-end && npm run build) && (cd back-end && npm run build || echo 'Nenhum build necessÃ¡rio para o back-end')
